questions.question: Which of the following best summarizes the ultimate goal and purpose of health education
options: To positively influence the health behavior of individuals and communities
To encourage self reliance when it comes to personal hygiene

questions.correctAnswer: To positively influence the health behavior of individuals and communities

Decrease demand or support for health services
questions.correctAnswer: Decrease demand or support for health services

options: Direct person to person or indirect

questions.correctAnswer: Direct person to person or indirect

questions.question: Posters when used to convey health information can be described as

questions.question: Which of the following is true of a direct form of health communication

The health worker is usually the principal communicator
The audience are usually the principal communicator
questions.correctAnswer: The health worker is usually the principal communicator
